readability_reflection: I found string concatenation more readable because I am used to doing it and the syntax, particularly in c++ and python. Even java.
comprehension_debugging: Yes, string interpolation was a bit more confusing as I did not have as much experience in it as string concatenation.
preference_rationale: String concatenation, because I think it is more straightforward, and that I and many other people have an easier time understanding it.
learning_curve: My prior coding classes and experience enabled me to understand what the question were asking for, relating to string manipulation and concatenation.
suggestions_improvement: Yes, if a programming language can be made with simple syntax to understand the string concatenation, I believe it would speed things up when writing these parts of programs, especially with c++.
